timeline.bodyText: Can unified json utils to Jackson util?
timeline.author: KomachiSion

timeline.bodyText: Should we modified this restTemplate.get method, if any error when execute get, call the callback.onError in the restTemplate.get rather than throw exception?
timeline.author: KomachiSion

timeline.message: Delete JOSNUtils and use JacksonUtils instead; modify NacosAsyncRestTemplate exception handling.
